event.title: Composer, FPM & gigHUB Night
event.description:
Join us for an evening of talks at BaseKit.

- Composer + you, the good, the bad, and the horribly ugly 
    Dan Ackroyd

- gigHUB, the journey so far
  (Laravel, Varnish, Pound & big data)
    Adam Nicholls, Goram & Vincent

- Introduction to PHP-FPM
    Tom Adam, Instantiate

Doors will be open from 6:45, talks will start around 7.

BaseKit have kindly sponsored the event again, providing their office as the venue, as well as beer and pizza! Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.

Afterwards we'll probably go to the pub, Horts tends to be the theme.

--

If there's anything in particular you want to hear about at PHPSW, make sure to add it to our Tricider http://tricider.com/brainstorming/1QCB5

If you want to speak at PHPSW, drop Steve a line at [masked]
